name: ZeobvVisibleDiscounts

infos.name: Sichtbare Rabatte - Machen Sie Ihre Werbeaktionen sichtbar
infos.description:
Kunden konvertieren bei Ihren Werbeaktionen

Shopware 6 macht Ihre Kunden nicht allzu sehr auf Ihre Rabatte aufmerksam. Dieses Plugin bemüht sich, das zu ändern. Es macht Listenpreise, Promotionen und Mengenrabatte auf den Listen- und Produktdetailseiten sichtbar. Jetzt werden die Aktionen, die Sie mit der Aktionsfunktion konfigurieren, direkt im Schaufenster angezeigt, anstatt nur in Ihrem Warenkorb. Der Rabatt wird dynamisch mit bereits bestehenden Rabatten aus konfigurierten Listenpreisen oder Mengenrabatten zusammengeführt.


Anzeigen, wie viel der Kunde tatsächlich spart

Geben Sie einen Listenpreis ein, der höher ist als der (Grund-)Preis, und wir kümmern uns um den Rest.

Ihre Produktkartons zeigen dem Kunden nun genau an, wie viel er spart, anstatt ein uninformatives "%"-Zeichen zu zeigen.
Erweiterte Preise für Mengenrabatte nutzen? Der sichtbare Rabatt ist auch mit der erweiterten Preisgestaltung kompatibel, die eine Preisspanne und den in jedem Schritt eingesparten Betrag anzeigt.
infos.installationManual:
• Laden Sie das Zeo Visible Discounts-Plugin aus dem Community Store herunter
  • Aktivieren Sie das Plugin in Ihrer Shopware 6-Installation
  • Dies kann über Einstellungen> System> Lizenzen erfolgen. Alternativ können Sie die Schaltfläche "Plugin hochladen" verwenden, um die ZIP-Datei des Plugins hochzuladen.
  • Sobald das Plugin aktiviert ist, werden Rabatte in der Storefront angezeigt.
infos.shortDescription: Dieses Plugin macht Rabatte auf einzelne Produkte auf den Kategorie- und Produktdetailseiten sichtbar. Unterstützt Rabatte für Massenpreise basierend auf dem Listenpreis.
infos.highlights:
Zeigen Sie Ihren Kunden Ihre Pseudopreise klar und deutlich.
Machen Sie dem Kunden klar, wie viel Rabatt er erhält, wenn er von Ihren erweiterten Preisen profitiert.
Geben Sie Ihren Kunden einen schnellen Überblick über die höchsten Rabatte direkt aus den Ergebnissen der Auflistung.
Halten Sie den ursprünglichen Pseudopreis sichtbar, wenn Sie erweiterte Preise verwenden
infos.features:
Rabatte von Listenpreisen werden auf verlockendere Weise präsentiert
Dynamische Werbeaktionen werden berechnet und außerhalb des Warenkorbs angezeigt
Preisnachlässe von Vorzugspreisen werden dem Kunden präsentiert, um zu zeigen, wie viel er tatsächlich spart
Werbeaktionen werden auf Produktebene gespeichert, so dass externe Dienstleister Rabatte auf Produktebene über die API abrufen können

infos.name: Visible discounts - make your promotions be seen
infos.description:
Customers convert on your promotions

Shopware 6 doens't make your customers all too aware about your discounts. This plugin strives to change that. It makes list prices, promotions and bulk discounts visible on the listing- and product detail pages. Now the promotions you configure using the Promotion function will show directly on the storefront instead of only in your cart. The discount gets dynamically merged with already existing discounts from configured List prices or bulk discounts.


Show how much the customer is actually saving

Enter a list price which is higher than the (basic) price and we take care of the rest.

Your product boxes will now tell the customer exactly how much they are saving instead of showing an uninformative "%"-sign


Using advanced prices for bulk discounts? Visible discount is also compatible with advanced pricing, showing a price range and the amount saved in each step.
infos.installationManual:
• Download the Zeo Visible Discounts plugin from the Community Store 
  • Activate the plugin in your Shopware 6 installation 
  • This can be done via Settings > System > Licenses. Alternatively, you can use the "Upload plugin" button to upload the plugin ZIP file. 
  • Once the plugin is activated discounts will show on the storefront.
infos.shortDescription: This plugin makes list prices, promotions and bulk discounts (more) visible on the category- and product detail pages. Supports discounts for bulk pricing based on the listing price.
infos.highlights:
Show your pseudo prices to your customers in a clear manner.
Make the customer clear how much discount they are receiving when they take profit of your advanced pricing.
Give customers a quick overview of the highest discounts directly from listing results.
Keep the original psuedo price visible when using advanced pricing
Make promotions count, discounts from dynamic promotions are now visible outside of the cart
infos.features:
Discounts from list prices are presented in a more enticing manner
Dynamic promotions get calculated and displayed outside of the cart
Discounts from advanced prices are presented to the customer to show how much they are actually saving
Promotions get saved on product level so external services can retrieve product level discounts via the API

changelog.text: -   Introduced compatibility for Shopware 6.5.0

-   Added visible discounts sale channel wise.

-   Resolved zero price issue in listing page when set-group promotion.
-   Adjustment to the calculation of the promotionalDiscount value. Now using the originalTotalPrice instead of the calculatedPrice.

-   Big refactor reducing code complexity

-   Improved discount algorithm

-   Fixed missing inline discount on checkout finish page

-   Fixed incorrect inline discount on checkout confirm page

-   Improved staffel pricing discount calculation

-   Fixed an issue where an incorrect fallback on absoluteDiscount in order line item overview was applied if promotionalDiscount value equaled 0.0

-   Added promotionalDiscount and absolutePromotionalDiscount to order line item payload.

-   Changed Total Discount value in Administration order line item to use absolutePromotionalDiscount instead of absoluteDiscount. absoluteDiscount will still be available in the order line item payload.
-   Patch to order line item grid to avoid error incase the calculated discounts are missing
-   Now showing inline discount, when enabled, on checkout confirm page

-   Added support for advanced prices that are higher than the default price

-   Added support for product layouts
-   Added extra condition on product detail page to use the cheapest price in combination of advanced prices
- Themeware badge compatibility fix
- Hotfix for exception thrown in some cases during cart processing.
- Fixed skipping of discount calculation for inactive or out of stock products
- Added support for discounted reference pricing
- Fixed clone issue of product object in cases of non cloneable extensions
- Small patch addressing an SEO issue

- Added improvements from v6.3 version 1.2.10. 

- Added option to hide discount badge from listing and product detail pages. 

- Simplified configuration settings.

- Promotion processing is optimized by skipping discounted price calculation during cart collecting and processing 

- Added option to show/hide the discount percentage label in the off-canvas cart
- Addressed issue in discounts presentation on listing pages.
- Added compatibility with NeonPlatformUnitarticles by skipping further discount calculation in cart if payload value is present

- Addressed issue where invalid rules were used in calculating the advanced discounted price. 

- Addressed issue where promotions wouldn't be removed if a product originally did not have a discount. 

- Significant performance optimisations
- Compatibility patch for Shopware v6.4

- Added compatibility with net tax mode

- Added extra config option to modify the number of decimals in the tax percentage 

- Added extra config option to hide small discount percentage on pdp
- Addressed issue where invalid rules were used in calculating the advanced discounted price.
- Addressed bug where discount would stayed applied on a cart item even after applying and removing a the discount code.
- Fixed issue in discounted tax display in checkout finish page
- Fixed issue in discounted tax display
- Fixed price calculation for advanced graduated pricing
- Hotfix for division by zero issue in cases where the list price has a value of 0
- Resolving rules in cart collector to avoid rule overload messing up advanced price discount calculation in cart.

- Fix in checkout tax presentation for discounts when discounts are merged in the line item price. 

- Fix for issue in advanced price discount presentation.

- Added discount info on cross-sell level configurable together with listing setting. 

- Fixed bug related to rules being loaded in the cart, resulting into confusing pricing in offcanvas-cart and cart view.

- Added extra configuration options to give more control surrounding the presentation of discounts 

- Added discount information on the line item level in offcanvas-cart, cart page and sidebar cart in checkout 

- Fixed various discount calculation issues 

- Added option to exclude promotions from the discount presentations 

- Added option to disable the option to remove a discount line item from the cart
- Resolved issue related to advanced pricing and promotions
- Patched rare issue where an error would occur if a certain discount rule fails

- Excluded absolute cart discounts from listing and detail discount price calculation 

- Added absolute discount per line item API support 

- Improved code structure
- Stabilized discount calculation and added API support

- Compatibility with v6.2 and v6.3 

- Added visibility for Marketing promotions in the product listing and detail pages.

# 1.0.3 

- Retested plugin following feedback Shopware

# 1.0.2

Small patch to listing discount

# 1.0.1 

- Patched division by zero on empty list price

- First version of the Zeo Visible Discounts for Shopware 6
